scripts.export: rm -rf ../temp-next-static-site && next build && next export -o ../temp-next-static-site && npm run delete:except:git && mv ../temp-next-static-site/* ../next-static-site
scripts.deploy:aws: next build && aws s3 cp ../next-static-site s3://nextjs-geoseong --recursive --acl public-read --profile 404hunter-geoseong
scripts.deploy:gitpage: next build && next export && gh-pages -d out -b master
